metadata.title: What is Veams-Generator?
metadata.lead: What is the real benefit of Veams-Generator?
metadata.contentTitle: Veams-Generator scaffolds out a new (simple or complex) application in a few minutes.

articleHeader.articleH1: Veams-Generator writes your build configuration (Gruntfile, Gulpfile), pulls in relevant build tasks and packages manager dependencies (Bower, npm) that you need for your build.
